text: Niscaya yisakale allahara lagata karaa pratisrauti arau nijara sapata tuccha mulyara binimayata bikrai karae, akhiraatata sihamtara kono ansa na'i; arau kiyamatara dina allahe sihamtara lagata katha nakaâ€™ba, sihamtara prati drsti'o nidiba arau sihamtaka paraisud'dha'o nakaraiba; arau sihamtara babe ache yantranadayaka sasti
